channel.title: Operations on MRI Group
channel.description: Recent content in Operations on MRI Group

item.title: Utilities
item.description: This page contains a set of useful scripts to launch dockerized applications in any machine of the MRI Group. Copy images Suppose you want to copy a Docker image to another host without using DockerHub: docker save <image> | bzip2 | pv | ssh -p <port> <username>@<host> 'bunzip2 | docker load' You can omit -p <port> if port is standard 22

item.title: Setup
item.description: In this page you can find all the instruction to setup a new machine. In order Operating System Default Users Docker In order to install JumpBox Hosts
